name: BugReportRacing
description:
Immerse yourself in a game representing the first stages of game development. Prototyping graphics, bugs and post-its of the development team are the main features of this game. Push yourself and try to get the best times in every level, but don't let the bugs frustrate you or you will fall into the water all the time. Based on Wipeout and Doritos Crash Course, Bug Report Racing will let you enjoy this kind of frenetic games, but with another perspective.

This is a just a Student Game Project meant as a demo for class. No further development is planned. Positive feedback is welcome!
